thread.title: Stayed here for the ACC tournament
thread.title_full: Stayed here for the ACC tournament - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: NCdesigndiva
title: Stayed here for the ACC tournament
text: The room was comfortable and the furnishings were new. The room did not feel small or cramped. There is a dispenser for water and bottles to hold the water....which is a plus for me! The staff was excellent. The location is very convenient and I will stay here again.
